display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(240, 240, 240); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 35px; margin-left: 185px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(240, 240, 240); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
第一次握手：
客户端向服务端发送连接请求：SYN（synchronous）

switch.text: 第一次握手： 客户端向服务端发送连接请求：SYN（synchronous）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 210px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(240, 240, 240); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 214px; height: 1px; padding-top: 175px; margin-left: 191px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(240, 240, 240); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
第二次握手：
服务端向客户端发送响应：ACK（Acknowledgement）和SYN

switch.text: 第二次握手： 服务端向客户端发送响应：ACK（Acknowledgement）和SYN

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 315px; margin-left: 204px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(240, 240, 240); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
第三次握手：
客户端收到SYN后发送ACK，同时建立连接

switch.text: 第三次握手： 客户端收到SYN后发送ACK，同时建立连接
